content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_projectDB;

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
select *
    from OPENROWSET(
        bulk ''raw/trip_data_green_delta'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data'',
        format = ''Delta''

    )as delta_trips_data'

*******************************************************************************************************************************


EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
select *
    from OPENROWSET(
        bulk ''raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data'',
        format = ''csv'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE

    )as csv_zones_data'


    *******************************************************************************************************************************

select payment_type, payment_type_desc from 
    OPENROWSET(
        bulk 'raw/payment_type.json',
         DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        format = 'csv',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'

    )with(
        jsondata NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) 
    as json_paymenttype_data
    CROSS APPLY openjson(jsondata) with (payment_type SMALLINT , payment_type_desc VARCHAR(15) )



*******************************************************************************************************************************

select *
    from OPENROWSET(
        bulk 'raw/trip_data_green_delta',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        format = 'Delta'

    )with (payment_type int,
PULocationID int, 
VendorID int 
) 
as delta_trips_data



select *
    from OPENROWSET(
        bulk 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        format = 'csv',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE

    )with(LocationID SMALLINT,
    Borough VARCHAR(50))
    as csv_zones_data



_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________




USE nyc_taxi_projectDB;

select csv_zones_data.Borough, count(delta_trips_data.VendorID) as total_trip,
COUNT(CASE when paymenttype_data.payment_type_desc = 'Credit card' then delta_trips_data.VendorID end) as card_trips,
COUNT(CASE when paymenttype_data.payment_type_desc = 'cash' then delta_trips_data.VendorID end) as cash_trips,
cast((sum(CASE when paymenttype_data.payment_type_desc = 'cash' then 1 else 0 end)/
cast(count(delta_trips_data.VendorID)as decimal))
*100 as decimal(5,2))as cash_trips_percentage,
cast((sum(CASE when paymenttype_data.payment_type_desc = 'Credit card' then 1 else 0 end)/
cast(count(delta_trips_data.VendorID)as decimal))
*100 as decimal(5,2))as card_trips_percentage
 from 
OPENROWSET(
        bulk 'raw/payment_type.json',
         DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        format = 'csv',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b')with( jsondata NVARCHAR(MAX) ) as json_data
    CROSS APPLY openjson(jsondata) with (
        payment_type SMALLINT ,
        payment_type_desc VARCHAR(15) )as paymenttype_data
join 
OPENROWSET(
        bulk 'raw/trip_data_green_delta',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        format = 'Delta'
    )with (
        payment_type int,
        PULocationID int, 
        VendorID int ,
           year VARCHAR(5),
    month VARCHAR(3)) as delta_trips_data
        
on delta_trips_data.payment_type = paymenttype_data.payment_type

join 

OPENROWSET(
        bulk 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        format = 'csv',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    )with(
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(50))as csv_zones_data

on delta_trips_data.PULocationID=csv_zones_data.LocationID

where delta_trips_data.year = '2021' and delta_trips_data.month = '01'
group by csv_zones_data.Borough 
order by count(delta_trips_data.VendorID);


___________________________________________________________________________________
